name: love email - space email theme
description: A pink reskin for the website Space Email. It changes a few images around and swaps out the colors, that's all it does. It only affects the main Space Email page, none of the others on the site (such as the splash page or FAQ) - this is intentional, trying to skin them was buggy and you don't visit them often anyway.
additional_info: If you encounter a bug with Space Email while using this style, please disable it and attempt to reproduce the bug before you contact Space Email's developer. I don't want them to have to deal with troubleshooting if it's a mistake on my end. If you encounter a bug you believe is related to the style (something being orange instead of pink, unreadable text, etc), please contact me either here or on my tumblr so I can try to resolve it. 7/18/2014 - first release!
